(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD might)
      (VP (VB have)
        (VP (VBN read)
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP
              (NP (DT this) (NN book))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ front) (NN page))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (NNP Sunday) (NNP Times)))))))
          (ADVP (RB recently)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(read-4, You-1)
aux(read-4, might-2)
aux(read-4, have-3)
root(ROOT-0, read-4)
prep(read-4, about-5)
det(book-7, this-6)
pobj(about-5, book-7)
prep(book-7, on-8)
det(page-11, the-9)
amod(page-11, front-10)
pobj(on-8, page-11)
prep(page-11, of-12)
det(Times-15, the-13)
nn(Times-15, Sunday-14)
pobj(of-12, Times-15)
advmod(read-4, recently-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Prof) (NNP Tommy) (NNP Koh))

        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (NN hawker) (NN food)))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN taught)
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (JJ culinary) (NNS schools)))
                (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP we))
                    (VP (MD can)
                      (VP (VB preserve)
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT the) (NN integrity))
                          (PP (IN of)
                            (NP (PRP$ our) (NN hawker) (NNS dishes))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS publishers) (NN Epigram))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (VP (VBN asked)
        (S
          (NP (PRP me))
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB contribute)
              (NP (NNS photos))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT this) (NN book))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (VP (VBN written)
                          (PP (IN as)
                            (NP
                              (NP (DT a) (NN guidebook))
                              (PP (IN for)
                                (NP (NN tourist)))
                              (SBAR
                                (WHNP (WP who))
                                (S
                                  (VP (MD may) (RB not)
                                    (VP (VB know)
                                      (PP (IN about)
                                        (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ local) (NNS dishes))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ surprised))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (NNP Epigram))
            (VP (VBZ has)
              (VP (VBN made)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP me))
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (NNP Co-Author))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (DT the) (`` ``) (NNP Carrot) (NNP Cake) ('' '') (NN book)))))))))))
    (IN so)
    (S
      (ADVP (RB now))
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (MD can)
        (ADVP (RB actually))
        (VP (VB say)
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (PRP I))
              (VP (VBP have)
                (VP (VBN published)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN book)))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (ADVP (RB Anyway))
      (NP (DT this))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN book))
        (SBAR (IN if)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (NP
                (NP (NNS friends))
                (PP (IN from)
                  (NP (RB overseas)))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP who))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBP have)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT no) (NN idea))
                        (SBAR
                          (WHNP (WP what))
                          (S
                            (NP (NNP Ang) (NNP Ku) (NNP Kueh))
                            (VP (VBZ is))))))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (ADVP (RB perhaps))
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD might)
        (ADVP (RB even))
        (VP (VB find)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (NN difficulty))
              (VP (VBG trying)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB explain)
                      (NP (PRP it))
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP (PRP them))))))))
            (VP (VB youself))))))
    (. !)))

          (PP (IN towards)

              (NP (DT the) (NN end))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NN year)))))

              (NP (NN time))

    (. .)))

advmod(kit-8, soon-9)
cc(giving-4, and-10)
nsubj(send-13, I-11)
aux(send-13, can-12)
conj(giving-4, send-13)
dobj(send-13, it-14)
prep(send-13, to-15)
pobj(to-15, you-16)
prep(send-13, for-17)
poss(preview-19, your-18)
pobj(for-17, preview-19)
